00014 #ifndef __FCD_OBJECT_H_
00015 #include "FCDocument/FCDObject.h"
00016 #endif // __FCD_OBJECT_H_
00017 
00018 class FCDExternalReference;
00019 typedef FUObjectList<FCDExternalReference> FCDExternalReferenceTrackList;
00020 
00021 class FCOLLADA_EXPORT FCDPlaceHolder : public FCDObject, FUObjectTracker
00022 {
00023 private:
00024     DeclareObjectType(FCDPlaceHolder);
00025 
00026     FCDocument* target;
00027     bool loadStatus;
00028     FCDExternalReferenceTrackList references;
00029     fstring fileUrl;
00030 
00031 public:
00032     FCDPlaceHolder(FCDocument* document, FCDocument* target = NULL);
00033     virtual ~FCDPlaceHolder();
00034 
00035     inline const FCDocument* GetTarget() const { return target; }
00036     FCDocument* GetTarget(bool loadIfMissing = true);
00037 
00038     void LoadTarget(FCDocument* _target = NULL);
00039     void UnloadTarget();
00040     bool IsTargetLoaded() const { return target != NULL; }
00041     const bool& GetLoadTargetStatus() const { return loadStatus; }
00042 
00043     const fstring& GetFileUrl() const;
00044     void SetFileUrl(const fstring& url);
00045 
00046     void AddExternalReference(FCDExternalReference* reference) { references.push_back(reference); SetDirtyFlag(); }
00047     void RemoveExternalReference(FCDExternalReference* reference) { references.erase(reference); SetDirtyFlag(); }
00048 
00049     size_t GetExternalReferenceCount() const { return references.size(); }
00050     const FCDExternalReference* GetExternalReference(size_t index) const { FUAssert(index < GetExternalReferenceCount(), return NULL); return references.at(index); }
00051 
00052 protected:
00053     void OnObjectReleased(FUObject* object);
00054 };
